comment.body: > [@Draconarache](https://github.com/Draconarache) Could you please show console in DevTools on these sites? > > Also please catrure HARs, if reproduced in private tabs without an account. > > How to get a HAR file: https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/har_analyzer/ > > Important: Open devtools before you open a site in private tab. Also disable caching in DevTools > > > Attach HARs as ZIP archive here. @Alex-302 [www.bdfugue.com.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/21493004/www.bdfugue.com.zip)

@ntnguyen1234 We don't block these in main lists, but block in the Widget filter. I'll move the rule. Somehow it is called sougo-RSS in Japanese, so some user refer simply as "RSS", though technically it's not RSS.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://www.roku.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.roku.com)
### Comment
> Roku devices will not play Paramount content with Adguard DNS servers.  Content will play using ISP DNS servers.  Roku stated on community forums the problem is ad blockers blocking doubleclick.   Hope I can discover a solution to block doubleclick and play Paramount content. 
```
Username: @jschafermo
```
